notes: Jackie hissed a few times and they growled at what seemed like each other.  Finn very sweet and likes pets.  Both ate a few treats.  Gave them 2 cans of FF chicken with treats on top
1 bowl was eaten, the other was 3/4 finished.  Gave another 1.5 cans FF with 1/8 can FM tuna mixed in with treats on top
Played with wand toy, Jackie came out of the tub, both played. Not much food is eaten.
poo was part 2 part 5
Only about 1/3 to 1/2 of food was eaten.  Kind of a poo in lots of little pieces, 6. Gave FF chicken + bit FM + treats.
Hissed when I came in, but then they got comfy and I pet them both.  They ate most of the food.
Had eaten all their food.  Finn was growling quite a bit at Jackie and even swatted at her when she got close.  Jackie seems a bit oblivious to it.
Had eaten all their food.  Both ate right away for a few minutes with new food.
Started letting them out.  They are quite comfortable.  Let them out for 2x20 min today.
Very bad poo, mostly in litterbox and grey, some mucusy outside, a bit of red that looked like tissue.
Looks like 2 pees.  Gave FF chicken alone.
Had eaten all their food.  Gave more FF chicken.
Another pee
Jackie had very soft grey poo, some stuck on the fur around her bum.
A little bit of liquid poo with a tiny bit of mucus from Jackie.
Gave them both 2 treats, 10 min later Finn vomited a little.
Gave them FF chicken + FM chicken
Ate 3/4 of food. Gave them FF chicken + FM chicken
Was able to clip Jackie's nails pretty easily while she was sitting with me on the couch
Only ate about 1/6 of previous food.  No poops today
Only ate about 1/6 of previous food.  Gave a small amount of fresh FF with treats and they ate about half right away.
Finn initianted petting, was rubbing on me for 5 minutes then our of no where bit and swatted at me, might have fotten overstimulated or just decided it was enough
no poops today, 3 days of no poops for Finn.  Gave FF + FM chicken + treats + pumpkin
Saw both kitties pee.  They had eaten most of the previous food.   Gave FF + FM chicken + treats + pumpkin
Jackie vomited, small volume, tiny bit of hair inside, clear but a little brown
no poops today (3 days for Finn, 2 days for Jackie).  Gave FF + FM + psyllium husk from Ops

Looks like both kitties pooped overnight (based on the amount of poop, and that one was on top, and one was buried in corner (2 on the scale).  Both peed in the morning. Gave half the amount of psyllium husk in case one didn't poo and since they seem a bit constipated in general.
Finn pooed, it was about a 5-6 on the scale.
Finn pooed again but it was very small and just looked like fur?
Gave revolution.  Finn was trying to lick at it, hopefully it was in the right spot so she couldn't get it.
Going to stop recording pees since they are doing it regularly and I'm more worried about the poops
Gave turkey pate + FF and a little chicken FM, they didn't seem to want to eat it right away
Gave some chicken stew which they seemed to like with FF
Gave some chicken stew which they seemed to like with turkey pate
Looks like maybe 2 poos, quite soft (5-6), there was also vomit on the towel
No poos or vomit, when offer small amount of 3 flavors of food they are preferring the FF chicken

There was a poo, I believe from Jackie, that was about a 3 on one end and a 5 on the other.  She went back 5 min later and a small volume of 6-7 came out. Then was zooming around, yowling, and licking her bum.  Then another small amount of 6-7.
Started up the psyllium again, and Zylkene more regularly
No poops

Poop from Jackie, better quality maybe a 3-4.  5 min later she went again a bit softer (5) then was zooming around and yowling like yesterday.  According to my notes doesn't seem like Finn has gone in a while.
No poops
2 poos overnights (4 and 5 according to Andrew), then we saw Finn poo (might make sense she would go twice since she hadn't gone since 19th, it was quite solid like a 3)
Jackie went again, was about a 4-5.  Then 5 min later a bit of 6-7 came out (some mucusy outside the box).  Started zooming around.
No poops
There was a poo (4-5) made this morning, not sure who.  Jackie then was zooming and yowling (so I think the first poo was hers) but no extra poo came out.
Finn taken to new home
Pooped, large amount that looked like 2 long solid poos.  Got more psyllium and lactulose from Ops (but didn't use lactulose yet because she already went)
Poop - maybe about a 3 on the scale, still a bit of a weird color, maybe a little gelatonous at the end
After no poops on Oct 5 and 6, gave 1 mL of lactulose this morning
Gave lactulose this morning (and previous 2 meals) and she pooped, good quality (2/3).  5 minutes later she meowed a few times in the bathroom
Had a second poo of the day, pretty good quality (2/3)
Had a poo, was about a 1 on one end, and like of weird looking, maybe mucus I dunno but softer on other end

had the zoomies and yeowling, had a small soft poo

Zooming and yowling.  She had a bit of solid poo then very runny, it's been quite a while without this behaviour, maybe because she was backed up for longer than usual.  She also left 2  mucus dribbles outside the box
